titleStmt.title: The high way to honor: as it was deliuered (for substance) in two sermons, at Alhallowes Barking in London, the one of August 6. the other on August 13. 1626. By Robert Louell minister and preacher of Gods worde, and curate of the same place
titleStmt.author: Lovell, Robert, curate of Allhallows, Barking.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Ni: Bourne, dwelling at the South entrance of the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The way to honour.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 715) and the British Library (reel 1633).
